HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

DIV.PRE: This layer contains the lakes that are part of the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Fisheries Resource Database. These include lakes that are currently or have previously been stocked, regulated or sampled.
Mapping and analysis of the various water bodies in Pennsylvania that are currently or have previously been stocked, regulated or sampled.

This layer was created by selecting the appropriate polygons from the National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer and copying into a new layer. Key attributes from the PFBC Fisheries Database records were appended to the lakes to complete the data set. This layer was created by selecting the appropriate polygons from the National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer and copying into a new layer. Key attributes from the PFBC Fisheries Database records were appended to the lakes to complete the data set.

None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.

DL.DD: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

DIV.PRE: The layer is based on the 1:24000 National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer.

This layer was created by selecting the appropriate polygons from the National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer and copying into a new layer. Key attributes from the PFBC Fisheries Database records were appended to the lakes to complete the data set. Database records were appended to the lakes to complete the data set.

DL.DT: Altitude_Encoding_Method:Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

DIV.PRE: Whether lake was stocked with fingerling sized trout in 2007

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
